title: Cocooning Lifestyle: Enjoying Happy and Safe Times at Home
description: What does Cocooning mean? Who invented Cocooning? What are the benefits and pleasures of a Cocooning lifestyle for me?Discover answers to these questions and many more from another book by Tess Jansen who already wrote about Niksen - The Power of Doing Nothing.A Cocooning lifestyle is a great help in times when you want to stay safely and happily at home. This book will show you the benefits and give you ideas on how to spend a great time at home, enjoy the benefits of de-stressing, and also of using gained additional time and freedom. Cocooning does not mean to be alone or even lonely! Even though this can be part of it, there are many ways to connect to other people.Get your copy today and enjoy these great inspirations for safe and happy times at home!
author: Tess Jansen
